কর্মসূচীর সাপ্তাহিক/মাসিক/ত্রৈমাসিক/ষান্মাসিক/বাৎসরিক প্রতিবেদন তৈরী করা ও সময়মত কর্তৃপক্ষকে প্রদান করা । মাঠকর্মীরা সাপ্তাহিক সভা সঠিকভাবে পরিচালনা করছেন কি-না তা পর্যবেক্ষণ করবেন ও প্রয়োজনীয় পরামর্শ প্রদান করবেন। মাঠকর্মীদের নিকট হতে সমিতির সদস্যদের ঋণ প্রস্তাব গ্রহণ করবেন এবং পরবর্তী প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করবেন। উপকারভোগীদের মধ্যে বিতরণকৃত ঋণ সুষ্ঠুভাবে প্রকল্প অনুযায়ী ব্যবহার হচ্ছে কিনা এবং তা নির্ধারিত শর্তানুযায়ী আদায় হচ্ছে কিনা তা অনুসরণ করবেন এবং প্রয়োজনীয় পদক্ষেপ গ্রহণ করবেন। আর্থিক নির্দেশিকা অনুযায়ী হিসাব নিকাশ পরিচালনা করা এবং সকল নথি সংরক্ষণ নিশ্চিত করা; জেলা ও উপজেলা পর্যায়ের কর্মকর্তা এবং উর্দ্ধতন কর্তৃপক্ষের সাথে সমন্বয় সাধন করা ও তাদেরকে প্রকল্পের কাজকর্ম নিয়মিত অবহিত করা; মাঠে কি কি সমস্যা হচ্ছে তা চিহ্নিত করে সমাধানের চেষ্টা করবেন এবং প্রয়োজনে উর্দ্ধতন কর্তৃপক্ষকে এ সম্পর্কে অবহিত করবেন যাতে সমস্যার সমাধান খুঁজে পাওয়া যায়; শাখা অফিসের চাহিদা অনুযায়ী দ্রব্য-সামগ্রীর চাহিদা নিরুপণ করে কর্তৃপক্ষের অনুমোদন নেয়া করা এবং তদানুযায়ী ক্রয় নিশ্চিত করা; ষ্টোরের মালামাল ও পুরাতন নথিপত্র নির্দেশ মোতাবেক যথাযথভাবে সংরক্ষণ নিশ্চিত করা । শাখা পর্যায়ে সকল কর্মীদের কাজের মূল্যায়ন করা । নিরীক্ষা প্রতিবেদন তৈরী করা;শাখা পর্যায়ে সকল কর্মীদের কাজের মূল্যায়ন করা । সংস্থা ও দাতা সংস্থার নিয়ম-নীতি অনুযায়ী এবং সরকারের চাহিদ

Internal control comprises the methods and means in place to achieve corporate objectives for business sustainability. The Board of Directors has the fundamental obligation to ensure that an effective and efficient system of the internal control is in place. Internal audit is responsible for reviewing and reporting on this control framework to the Board Audit committee, a sub-committee of the Board. ACCOUNTABILITIES: Assisting in developing and maintaining a risk-based compliance/Internal Audit Plan that assesses the adequacy and effectiveness of internal controls and processes and the reliability and integrity of operational and related financial information. Conducting internal audits of various operational processes in line with corporate policies and guidelines, producing reports that highlight audit findings and issues / control weaknesses, making recommendations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of internal controls. Conducting MIS review, highlighting any accounting issues and related control weaknesses, recommend management accordingly for better financial reporting. Follow-up review of issues identified and addressed to SBU as per their action plan. Review presentations and disclosures of statutory financial statements of SBUs’ (as and when require) and recommend for improvement in line with Financial Reporting Standards and other related laws and regulations Conduct or assist special audit / financial irregularities investigations (as and when require) as advised by Head of Compliance & Audit / Board Audit Committee. Visit to outstation of SBUs as and when required. Skills & Expertise Accounting Audit Business

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context Job Context: As the Senior Tailoring & Pattern Master your mission is to transform complex design concepts into perfect, production-ready garments. By balancing traditional tailoring craftsmanship with modern speed, you ensure that every sample meets international fit standards. Job Responsibilities 1. Technical Pattern Development Drafting & Accuracy: Draft, design, and finalize garment patterns based on client measurements, designer sketches, or technical specifications. Ensure accuracy in fit, proportion, and style across all garments. Design Alignment: Ensure pattern Spec does correspond with design. Anatomical Knowledge: Have good understanding of key area of body shape (Menswear, Womenswear, and Childrenswear) and prepare any kinds of spec within short time. Workflow Integration: Possess clear idea about sewing method which will not conflict while creating pattern. 2. Fittings, Adjustments & Grading Silhouette Mastery: Lead fitting sessions with clients or models, making precise alterations to achieve the desired silhouette. Adapt patterns to different body types while maintaining design integrity. Regional Grading: Be capable to grade the pattern from the base size and also have understanding of the appropriate grading rules on various region. Production Advocacy: Act as a bridge between design and production; provide expert pushback and solutions when design elements compromise production feasibility or fit quality 3. Construction & Quality Control Fabric Analysis: Assess fabric behavior (stretch, drape, shrinkage) and adjust patterns accordingly. Technical Consulting: Provide technical input on garment construction methods to optimize quality and durability. Standardization: Oversee cutting and tailoring processes to ensure patterns are executed correctly. Maintain consistency in sizing, finishing, and craftsmanship standards. 4. Leadership & Operational Innovation Mentorship: Supervise and train junior pattern makers and tailors. Share advanced techniques and best practices to elevate team performance. Cross-Department Collaboration: Work closely with designers, production managers, and clients to translate creative concepts into wearable garments. Communicate effectively across departments to meet deadlines and maintain brand standards. Modernization: Introduce modern tools such as CAD pattern-making software while preserving traditional tailoring excellence. Efficiency: Streamli

Ability to work in shifts and under pressure Professional attitude and patient-friendly behavior. Responsibilities & Context Provide nursing care to ENT patients in OPD, ward, and operation theatre. Assist ENT specialists during examinations, procedures, and surgeries. Monitor patients’ vital signs and maintain medical records accurately. Ensure proper infection control and hygiene standards. Administer medications as prescribed by physicians. Maintain patient comfort and provide counseling to patients and attendants. Perform other duties as assigned by the hospital authority. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Nurse/ Paramedics Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Mohakhali) Company Information Society for Assistance to Hearing Impaired Children (SAHIC) Follow More jobs from this company Address: Kha-16, Mohakhali Health Complex, Mohakhali, Dhaka-1212, Bangladesh Business: The Society for Assistance to Hearing Impaired Children (SAHIC) is a well-established voluntary non-government organization founded in 1987 and registered with the Department of Social Services and the NGO Affairs Bureau. Founded by Professor M. Nurul Amin, a distinguished ENT specialist, SAHIC is dedicated to the prevention, early detection, and rehabilitation of hearing-impaired children in Bangladesh.

With the support of Andheri Hilfe, Germany, and the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, SAHIC established its permanent centre at Mohakhali, Dhaka, in 1992. The organization operates an ENT Hospital and a Pre-school for Hearing-Impaired Children, providing specialized medical care, hearing and speech services, and early childhood education.

Through its comprehensive healthcare and education programs, SAHIC continues to play a significant role in improving the quality of life of hearing-impaired children, with support from the Government of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh and various national and international development partners.
